plot: Three people from the future are spiritually sent back in time to relive the era of Caesar, Marc Anthony and Cleopatra. As close companions to these key historical figures, they seek to understand the nature of an enemy's plan in their own time.
ending_theme: "Guerilla no Uta" (ゲリラの歌; Song of the Guerilla) by Rokumonsen
insert_song: "Cleopatra no Namida" (クレオパトラの涙; Cleopatra in the Nile) by Saori Yuki
